scripts.check: pnpm run check:format -- --list-different && pnpm run check:lint
scripts.commit: pnpm run fix && git commit -am "chore: Generated release files"
scripts.dist: pnpm run clean && pnpm run build && attw --pack . --ignore-rules cjs-resolves-to-esm
scripts.fix: pnpm run fix:format && pnpm run fix:lint
scripts.postversion: git push origin && git push origin --tags && pnpm publish --access public && git reset --hard
scripts.preversion: git checkout main && git pull && pnpm install && pnpm run test && pnpm run dist
scripts.release:major: generate-changelog -M -x "chore,test" && pnpm run docs && pnpm run commit && pnpm version major
scripts.release:minor: generate-changelog -m -x "chore,test" && pnpm run docs && pnpm run commit && pnpm version minor
scripts.release:patch: generate-changelog -p -x "chore,test" && pnpm run docs && pnpm run commit && pnpm version patch
scripts.test: pnpm run test:types && pnpm run test:unit:coverage
